content: Credit Card Shopping Lifestyle Asked by AnonymousAsked on 10 Sep 2019I will be making a $10k purchase. What's the best way to pay for it to get more rebates?I will be buying flight tickets from British Airways. Elijah Lee, Independent Financial Advisor at Phillip Securities (Jurong East Lite)Top Contributor (Sep)Level 9. God of WisdomAnswered on 11 Sep 2019Do consider the current options here: https://milelion.com/credit-cards/current-credit-card-signup-bonuses/
A number of miles credit cards have decent signup bonuses which will be easily met with your $10K spend. However, do choose your card carefully as the miles earning rate/transfer partner/validity of the miles will vary from card to card. Take some time to do your research.0 comments5
